name: projektwahl-lit
description: Software to manage choosing projects and automatically assigning people to projects.

scripts.format: docker build -t getting-started . && docker run --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/tests,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/tests --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/src -it getting-started npm run format
scripts.test_: docker build -t getting-started . && docker run --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/tests/e2e/new-tests.ts,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/tests/e2e/new-tests.ts --net=host -e BASE_URL -e DATABASE_URL -e DATABASE_HOST -e CI=1 -it getting-started npm run test
scripts.lint: docker build -t getting-started . && docker run --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/tests,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/tests --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/src -it getting-started npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: docker build -t getting-started . && docker run --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/tests,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/tests --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/src -it getting-started npm run lint:fix
scripts.localize-extract: mkdir -p src/client/generated && docker build -t getting-started . && docker run --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/xliff,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/xliff -it getting-started npm run localize-extract
scripts.localize-build: mkdir -p src/client/generated && docker build -t getting-started . && docker run --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src/client/generated,target=/opt/projektwahl-lit/src/client/generated -it getting-started npm run localize-build
